name: Desearch
description:
Chill game about surfing the desert, picking up lost packages and exploring ancient ruins. Inspired by Alto's Odyssey, Journey and Death Stranding.

Made by Cone Games:
Me, and Falillo as Programmers.
CeciliArTrash, as Concept Artist, Texture Painter and Character Designer.
PabloVazquez3D as 3D Artist, modelling the enviroment and the character.
